name: Celestial Suit
description:
The Celestial Suit is a suit which grants different tools which you have to unlock, among which are:

  • Rocket boots: Allow the player to have double jump.
  • Gravity boots: Allow the player to reverse their own gravity, but cannot jump.
  • Climbing gloves: Allow the player to climb the walls.
  • Jetpack: They allow the player to fly a small amount. It recharges after touching the ground.
  • Dash cap: Allows the player to cross certain walls and give a slight impulse to the place where he is moving.
  • Grappling Hook: Allows the player to shoot a hook in any direction and be attracted by a rope to the place where the hook falls.

The only problem with this suit is that you can only use one tool at a time.

Controls (Keyboard or Xbox Gamepad):

  • WASD/ Left Stick 
    • Movement
  • Space/ A
    • Jump
  • Enter/ Start
    • Enter in a World/ Chest
  • Shift/ X
    • Grab.
  • Right Mouse Button/ RT
    • Open tool selection.
